Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add Endfield game plugin and multi-game infrastructure

Implemented multi-game support system with Endfield as the second game.

Core Features:
- Game registry system for managing multiple games
- Game selector UI component in header
- Endfield game plugin with complete data structure
- Recipe-based synthesis system \(different from WW''s 3:1 tier system\)

Endfield Implementation:
- Game configuration \(level progression: 1-20, 20-40, 40-60, 60-80, 80-90\)
- Data templates: character.json, weapon.json, materials.json, costs.json
- Recipe-based synthesis: synthesisRecipes.json
- Tiered materials system
- Raw data input view at /endfield-data route

Infrastructure:
- GameRegistry store for game selection and persistence
- GameSelector component for switching between WW and Endfield
- Auto-reload on game switch
- localStorage persistence for game selection

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Game-specific CharacterDialog with dropdown UI and level-based passive skills

- Add game-specific CharacterDialog components \(WW/Endfield\) with dropdown selects
- Refactor WW passive skills from boolean to level-based system \(0→2\)
- Update ProgressionEngine._calculateCharacterPassiveMaterials for new structure
- Fix material calculation: weeklyBoss category mapping, credit handling
- Fix completeGoal to update passive skills current_level to target_level
- Add dynamic component loading via gameStore.getComponent\(\)
- Remove deprecated shared CharacterDialog component

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
